title: Waffles
directions: In a medium bowl, sift the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Whisk the egg, milk, and oil in a separate bowl.
Add the wet ingredients to the the dry and mix until just incorporated.
Grease the waffle maker with butter or coat with a light coat of cooking spray.
Pour 1/4 cup of the batter into the mini waffle maker and cook until golden brown. Repeat with the remaining batter.
Serve with a drizzle of maple syrup and fresh berries.
